title: EXPLOITATION - BEFORE EOD*1 DARWIN (AFTER ATLAS EOD*1 )- SAVE DARWIN FILES TO REPO
time_sequence: GN - ATLAS PHASE 5.3 - PROCESSING AFTER STAR 1

task_list.instruction_title:
**_**Exécuter le job:
**_**Verifie qu'ATLAS a bien envoyé tous les fichiers attendus par le STAR1 DARWIN 

**
_Group :_              **285_DARWIN_FILES_S1-EV3**
_Application :_     **E3_T-AAA-INTGR-BANK**
_TABLE :_        **285_DARWIN_FILES_S1_AAA_BCK_SYBASE_EV3/285_DARWIN_FILES_S1_AAA_SAVE_FILE_DARWIN_EV3**
_JOBS :_                  
****Job1** : 285-CHECK-EOD-FILES_STAR1 : Verification de presence des  fichiers necessaires a la migration EOD/EOW/EOM DARWIN envoyes par ATLAS
**Job 3-4-5** : 285-DARWIN-SYBASE-SAVE : Sauvegarder dans le **REPO **et non sur le serveur DARWIN
**Job 6 **: 285-RESET-DARWIN-EOD-FILE-INITIAL-STAR1 : Suppression des fichiers envoyes par ATLAS pour la migration EOD/EOW/EOM DARWIN dans host/Host/initial

Procedure to follow in case of error:

Message to send to the SPOC_INTEGRATION and/or ATLAS team:

In the Control-M sysout, two scenarios may occur:

**1st Case: Incorrect file size:**

Sysout:

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Check file size for FDWD.R699
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Typically, the files /host/Host/Initial/FDWD.R699 and /host/Host/Initial/FDWD.R700 contain the complete performance history, and their size should be approximately:
_- Verify that the file size of /host/Host/Initial/FDWD.R699 is > 200 MB
- Verify that the file size of /host/Host/Initial/FDWD.R700 is > 500 MB

Attach the sysout to the relevant teams.

In this cas please contact ATLAS TEAM to check provided files

**For information:** On the ATLAS server, there is usually a version of the two files sent to ODS incrementally and another sent to Darwin in full.

**2nd Case: Missing files:**

In this case, send the sysout containing the list of missing files to ATLAS Team. Once All the files are available in ATLAS repository, SPOC_EXPLOITATION and/or SPOC_INTEGRATION have to transfer these files again.

Once fixed, reRun the job and loop on this Step until it runs Sucessfully.
